page.title: 16Interview - Farmer
page.content: {Mr Stennett}is a local farmer.He has a great many cattle and sheep.He is also the Chairman of the local school Govenors and he has held this office for quite a few years.He has been a farmer for a long time.He keeps and shows{Limousin,Simmental and Belgian {Blue}cattle.He also keeps horses.He has four dogs and lots of cats.He has got five Belgian Blue calves which are important because there are only a few of these in the country.He has had Champions at the local shows and been placed many times.He often has to go away to livestock sales with a company called{John Thornborough & Co.}He works hard everyday from about 6.00 a.m. until about 11.00 p.m.
